explanation: [0-0] A shirtless guy with brown hair is sitting up in bed with the duvet covering him, scratching his head. A white pillow rests against...

[0-5] The guy shifts his body, throws off the duvet, puts on his trousers, and gets out of bed. As the camera zooms in, he takes out an iron and carefully irons the bed sheet. The camera zooms out to show him placing the pillow at the head of the bed and spraying perfume on it.

[5-8] The scene switches to the living room, where the guy is wearing a gray T-shirt, black trousers, and a black cap. After cleaning, he places the cushions on the sofa and smooths them out with his hands.

[10-16] The camera then zooms out. The guy walks to his computer desk, with a white table diagonally opposite. There is a chair in front of the computer desk, and a rug on the wooden floor beneath it. A brown sofa sits on the rug. A potted plant is placed beside the computer desk, and a floor lamp stands next to the sofa. A television hangs on the wall facing the sofa. The guy takes out a black yoga mat and lays it on the rug. He then brings over a bench and places it on the yoga mat before starting his workout. After exercising, he removes the bench and vacuums the yoga mat. After cleaning, he puts the yoga mat away, brings the sofa back to its original position, and adjusts the blanket on it.
